patthana15.1:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they are included in the discourses and found, as it’s amazing.
patthana15.1:1.1_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
patthana15.1:10.1_0: There is no way for the unskillful.
patthana15.1:11.1_0: Not knowing the unskillful is a cause, not skillful.
patthana15.1:12.1_0: No cause for the sake of worldly unskillful and skilled in causes.
patthana15.1:13.1_0: (All should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana15.1:14.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana15.1:15.1_0: But for the sake of the unskillful ...
patthana15.1:16.1_0: for the sake of not skilled in the teaching, not for the sake of what is unskillful.
patthana15.1:17.1_0: But for the sake of his unskillful qualities, not for the sake of the unskillful.
patthana15.1:18.1_0: There are one supported by a lineage, with the nine supports, and three kinds of support. In one case, one experiences the three absorptions through the next life, the ninety-tambodths. The twenty-five faculties. Contact is the one sense faculties, the three absorptions, the three absorptions, and the three absorptions. Namely and the four absorptions.
patthana15.1:19.0_0: propose this, he came to the uneven ground.
patthana15.1:19.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the sake of undetermined teaching.
patthana15.1:19.1_1: ‘... for the sake of the three realms.’ ...
patthana15.1:19.1_4: (The following should be expanded as in SN 35.18.)
patthana15.1:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the unskillful.
patthana15.1:2.1_1: No cause is a reason for the sake of skillful teaching.
patthana15.1:2.1_2: No cause is a reason for the sake of skillful teaching ...
patthana15.1:2.1_3: (This should be expanded as in the three.)
patthana15.1:4.1_0: (All should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana15.1:5.1_0: Not knowing what is the cause or condition for the teaching.
patthana15.1:6.1_0: So that’s the cause or condition for the teaching.
patthana15.1:7.1_0: It’s not the reason for the sake of skillful, for the sake of the teaching, for the sake of support, or for three reasons.
patthana15.1:8.1_0: Or for the sake of skillful qualities or for the sake of listening to the teaching.
patthana15.1:9.1_0: There are one supported by the basis for ending the three supports. Within connection with the range of the mind, one-standed and the three announcements. Afterwards there are one hundred and three.
patthana15.1:9.1_2: (This should be expanded in detail as in the chapter.)
